content: Today, that rate stands at roughly 150 basis points and we believe the significant increase in LIBOR is a significant positive event for our CLO junior debt, and should continue to increase the company's net investment income beginning in the second quarter of 2022 as 100% of the CLO debt investments that we hold our floating rate. We certainly believe that the rising rate environment, all of our CLO debt securities, our floating rate investments, we believe the company is well-positioned to continue to grow its net investment income over the coming months and quarters.
